text: Hagi Deviti'a Moapu vahe'enena ha' huzamanteno ha'ma huzamagatenereno, ana vahera mopafi maseho hige'za masempi hu'za vazageno, nofiteti avazuhuno mesarimi huno ke'ne. Hagi 3a kevu vahepintira tare kevu vahera zamahe vaganereno, mago kevu vahera ozamaheno zamatrege'za agri agoraga mani'naze. Hagi Moapu vahe'ma ozmahe zamatrea vahe'mo'za agri agorga mani'za takesi zagoa Devitina ami'naze.
